comments: He had high expectations for essay questions and exams, but he was very thourough with his notes and lectures. He posted all of the slides online so we could print them up and he was always helpful when you needed any help. I didn\'t like the fact that it tooks weeks to get exams back and I never saw a quiz come back at all.
He is extremely difficult, with pages and pages of reading and notes. He is very passionate about history, but is just impossible to please. This class was definitely a challenge.

Good teacher, pretty young so he relates well to the students. History is a pretty boring subject in my opinion but he has a love for the subject and tries to make it interesting. He has study guides for his tests and you only have to write one paper. I liked him a lot.
